abstract: Carlyle Group announced that it’s teaming up with the Beijing government to launch a domestic Chinese private equity fund, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Carlyle Group announced that it’s teaming up with the Beijing government to launch a domestic Chinese private equity fund, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group, following in the footsteps of one of its biggest rivals, announced that it was teaming up with the Beijing government to start a domestic Chinese private equity fund, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Carlyle Starts China Fund With Beijing
